title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust achieves record YTD high, outperforming Bitcoin
description:
Quick Take The Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) has recently demonstrated a remarkable performance, closing at year-to-date highs and marking a 266% increase YTD. Notably, GBTC and BTC exhibited parallel movements during the first half of the year. Since June 2023, a distinct divergence has emerged within the crypto market. During this period, the Grayscale Bitcoin […]

The post Grayscale Bitcoin Trust achieves record YTD high, outperforming Bitcoin appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: With Bitcoin Faltering in Recovery, Will Arbitrum (ARB) and Algorand (ALGO) Seize the Day to Break Out?
description: Dive into the evolving dynamics of the cryptocurrency market, focusing on Algorand (ALGO) and Arbitrum (ARB) as they navigate a crucial phase against Bitcoin's lagging performance. Our in-depth analysis highlights ALGO resilience and ARB potential in a market ripe for recovery. Stay informed and ahead of the curve with our expert insights, designed to help you decipher the complexities of this rapidly changing landscape, where every move could lead to significant shifts in market dominance

title: MAS of Singapore introduces enhanced regulations for digital payment token services
description: In a significant move to regulate the burgeoning cryptocurrency market, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has released its set of responses to the feedback on proposed regulations for Digital Payment tokens (DPT) service providers in Singapore. This announcement, made on November 23, 2023, marks a pivotal step in the country’s efforts to establish a ... Read more

title: Bitcoin makes leap above $37K amid spot ETF approval rumors
description: In the recent dynamics of the cryptocurrency market, this week witnessed a positive turn as Bitcoin (BTC) surpassed the $37,400 mark and continued to trend upward despite the departure of a significant figure in the crypto space. title: Bitget Wallet and WOOFi Partner to Expand Access to Decentralized Trading Features
description: Bitget Wallet, a leading multi-chain wallet, has joined forces with WOOFi, a decentralized exchange (DEX) to enable accessibility to decentralized finance (DeFi). Starting today, Bitget wallet users will gain seamless connectivity to the WOOFi platform through a dedicated mobile application and browser extension. This integration aims to bring the full spectrum of WOOFi’s decentralized trading [...]

title: Former Bloomberg Analyst Says AI, NFTs and Three More Crypto Use Cases Will Drive Blockchain Adoption
description:
Crypto analyst Jamie Coutts says five key trends will drive the mainstream adoption of blockchain technology. Coutts, a former crypto market analyst at Bloomberg Intelligence, says on the social media platform X that payments, account abstraction, real-world assets, non-fungible tokens (NFTs)/gaming, and artificial intelligence (AI) will all accelerate global blockchain usage. In terms of payments, […]

The post Former Bloomberg Analyst Says AI, NFTs and Three More Crypto Use Cases Will Drive Blockchain Adoption appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
